short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to enhance functionality of ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your ChatGPT experience with our Chrome extension, which adds a toolbar and extra features to improve productivity and convenience while using the ChatGPT website.


- Customizable toolbar: Configure sampling parameters and prompts(instructions) right from the toolbar to streamline your ChatGPT interactions.
- Advanced search(WIP): Easily search through your ChatGPT throughout conversations with our powerful search feature that the original site doesn't provide.
- Notifications(WIP): Get notified when your ChatGPT answers are generated so you can stay informed and responsive.
